document_data.name: ''Flicka''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Flicka''''' was a [[magic]]al and powerful [[dagger]] that could be thrown at enemies.
document_data.Description: Flicka was owned by the adventuring [[wizard]] and self-proclaimed greatest mage in the [[Realms]], [[Kirath]]. This unique weapon was found among his remains in the reaches of [[Xanathar]]'s outer sanctum. The powerful weapon had a ''+5'' enchantment.
